content: by westknits version 3 heel turn row 1 rs k15 17 19 21 23 ssk k1 turn to work pattern repeat ws round 2 k to m slm work in pattern to m slm k to end of round row 2 ws sl1 purl-wise wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn to work rs round 3 k to 2 sts before m k2tog slm work in pattern to m slm ssk k to end of round 2 sts decreased heel turn pattern repeat repeat rnds 2 & 3 of pattern repeat until you decrease row 3 rs s1 knit-wise wyib k to 1 st before gap all gusset sts and have 52 60 68 76 84 sts on your ssk k1 turn to work ws needle for some sizes this means that on your final row 4 ws sl1 purl-wise wyif p to 1 st before gap decrease round you may only need to decrease 1 st to p2tog p1 turn to work rs achieve the final recommended stitch count of 52 60 68 76 84 sts you can remove the gusset stitch markers repeat last 2 row until you have worked all the way to and continue working the foot in the round keep the each end you should have 16 18 20 22 23 sts on your beginning of round marker in place needle after you have turned the heel if you are missing a stitch or two or if you have one or two extra sts you can foot sneak in a decrease or increase during the next round continue working the foot by knitting all sts in the round until your sock reaches just below the top of your smallest toe gusset then you should be ready for the toe decreases round 1 is written on several lines for easier reading if you are knitting on dpn s you can place a split ring marker in remove the beginning of round marker k13 15 17 19 the fabric when it says to pm rather than on your needle 21 place marker to mark the new beginning of round if you to help mark the decrease locations are working with dpn s you can place a split ring marker into the fabric instead of on your needle to help mark your round 1 rs k8 9 10 11 11 sts from the heel decrease locations during round 1 pm to mark the new beginning of round at the center of the heel k8 9 10 11 12 pick up and k14 16 18 20 22 sts along the left edge of the garter stitch heel flap pm k26 30 34 38 42 these are the other half of the sts from the leg pm pick up and k14 16 18 20 22 along the right edge of the garter stitch heel flap k8 9 10 11 11 you should now be at the beginning of the round at the center of the heel flap 70 80 90 100 109
